org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl
Class AeBaseFaultFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.AeBaseFaultFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeFaultFactory
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeBPWSFaultFactory, AeWSBPELFaultFactory
public abstract class AeBaseFaultFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeFaultFactory

Base class for the fault factories. Provides the fault names for the AE faults that cover fault conditions not described in the BPEL spec.

Field Summary
protected static java.lang.String COORD_COMP_TERMINATED
          Identifier for interal ae:coordinatedCompensationTerminated: used to signal that a coordinated compensation was terminated
protected static java.lang.String EARLY_TERMINATION_FAULT
          Identifier for internal ae:earlyTermination: used to implement breaking out of a loop via a break or continue
protected static java.lang.String EXTERNAL_AMBIGUOUS_RECEIVE
          Identifier for a ambiguousReceive that needs to be propagated to an external service
protected static java.lang.String EXTERNAL_MISSING_REPLY
          Identifier for a missingReply that needs to be propagated to an external service
private  java.lang.String mNamespace
          namespace for the current version of BPEL
protected static java.lang.String PROCESS_CANCELLED
          Identifier for internal ae:processCancelled fault, thrown when a sub process is cancelled by the coordination manager
protected static java.lang.String PROCESS_TERMINATED
          Identifier for internal ae:processTerminated fault, thrown when a process is terminated by means of admin API or exit activity
protected static java.lang.String RETRY_FAULT
          Identifier for internal ae:retryFault: used to trigger a scope's compensation handlers if it's being retried
protected static java.lang.String STATIC_ANALYSIS_FAILURE
          Identifier for ae:static analysis fault.

Method Detail

getExternalMissingReply

public IAeFault getExternalMissingReply()
Description copied from interface: IAeFaultFactory
AE specific error for reporting that a request-response style operation invoke will not be responded to. The process that is failing to reply will have faulted with a bpel:missingReply fault but the service that invoked us will get this fault.

Specified by:
getExternalMissingReply in interface IAeFaultFactory
See Also:
IAeFaultFactory.getExternalMissingReply()
